sections.heading: machines; screens required.A metal or other suitable screen shall be placed around each laundry extractor or other exposed high-speed revolving machinery

sections.text:
48-410.Revolving machines; screens required.

A metal or other suitable screen shall be placed around each laundry extractor or other exposed high-speed revolving machinery.

SourceLaws 1919, c. 190, tit. IV, art. IV, § 10, p. 561;C.S.1922, § 7691;C.S.1929, § 48-410;R.S.1943, § 48-410.
